abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32462761, pmid32458479, pmid32459046, pmid32459175, pmid32458267, pmid32456461, pmid32458694, pmid32459137, pmid32456716, pmid32459186, pmid32458279, pmid32458739, pmid32458333, pmid32454512, pmid32458356, pmid32454500, pmid32458561, pmid32458400, pmid32458805, pmid32461672, pmid32458289, pmid32455478, pmid32458770, pmid32458536, pmid32456689, pmid32455485, pmid32458760, pmid32456720, pmid32458551, pmid32458550, pmid32458597, pmid32458459, pmid32455475
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.05.29
